name: Alchemage
description: You accidently stepped into a mysterious land and started an epic adventure only to return home. You build shelters, explore biomes, fight with monsters, and discover ancient ruins to uncover the myth of the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Window 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB graphics memory and DirectX 11 compatible DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: Window 7 or higher Processor: 3.0 Ghz Dual Core or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB graphics memory and DirectX 11 compatible DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
